statements.name: PROC DQSCHEME
statements.description: Creates scheme data sets and analysis data sets and applies schemes to input data sets.

statements.name: APPLY
statements.description: Applies a scheme to transform the values of a single variable.

statements.name: CONVERT
statements.description: Converts schemes between SAS and QKB scheme file formats.

statements.name: CREATE
statements.description: Creates a scheme or an analysis data set.
